messages.content: Don't wake up on December 13th with a Hard Tory Brexit for breakfast and an NHS winter crisis for Christmas. Come together behind Labour for the real change we need.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Rapid housing growth needs better services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign to reopen Wantage hospital, reverse Sure Start closures and reopen rural bus routes with free travel for under 25s.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The climate emergency can't wait for 2050
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to radical actions to reduce emissions by the 2030s.
Hold a referendum within 6 months and campaign to Remain.
Reverse privatisation & make personal care & prescriptions free.
Reopen Sure Start Centres & abolish college & uni tuition fees.
£10 minimum wage for all ages and abolish the gender pay gap.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour came a clear 2nd in 2017's General Election, the Liberal Democrats scored little over half of our vote total. There is a chance to boot Boris Johnson out of Downing Street, to stop his Farage-backed Brexit and secure a referendum.

issues.brexitEurope: Fighting for a final say on Brexit and a fair deal for Wantage.
issues.economy: Transform the economy to net zero in world-leading time. The pain of austerity won't be addressed and our economy will continue to benefit the richest 1%. £10 minimum wage for all ages and abolish the gender pay gap.
issues.education: Reopen Sure Start Centres & abolish college & uni tuition fees.
issues.environment: Commitment to radical actions to reduce emissions by the 2030s.
issues.health: Reopen Wantage hospital, reverse Sure Start closures and reopen rural bus routes with free travel for under 25s. Reverse privatisation & make personal care & prescriptions free.
issues.transport: Reopen rural bus routes with free travel for under 25s.

community.content: The huge number of new homes being built across Wantage constituency should have been matched with investment in services but we've seen the opposite.

endorsements.endorsement: Jonny has been a tireless pro-Europe campaigner both in the 2016 campaign and for a public vote and free movement since. He’d make an excellent MP for Wantage and I urge all voters to rally around him to stop Johnson.

examples: Labour came a clear 2nd in 2017's General Election, the Liberal Democrats scored little over half of our vote total.
In this constituency, the only candidate backing radical action to reduce emissions by the 2030s is Labour's Jonny Roberts.
The Tory plans for reaching net zero carbon emissions by 2050 are woefully inadequate and frankly dangerous.
Reopen Wantage hospital, reverse Sure Start closures and reopen rural bus routes with free travel for under 25s.
The huge number of new homes being built across Wantage constituency should have been matched with investment in services but we've seen the opposite.
Transform the economy to net zero in world-leading time.
The pain of austerity won't be addressed and our economy will continue to benefit the richest 1%.
Hold a referendum within 6 months and campaign to Remain.

Jonny has been a tireless pro-Europe campaigner both in the 2016 campaign and for a public vote and free movement since. He’d make an excellent MP for Wantage and I urge all voters to rally around him to stop Johnson. - Andrew Adonis
The huge number of new homes being built across Wantage constituency should have been matched with investment in services but we've seen the opposite.
The Tory plans for reaching net zero carbon emissions by 2050 are woefully inadequate and frankly dangerous, the Lib Dem target of 2045 is a green-wash token gesture.
The pain of austerity won't be addressed and our economy will continue to benefit the richest 1%.
There is a chance to boot Boris Johnson out of Downing Street, to stop his Farage-backed Brexit and secure a referendum.
The Tory plans for reaching net zero carbon emissions by 2050 are woefully inadequate and frankly dangerous.
There is a chance to boot Boris Johnson out of Downing Street, to stop his Farage-backed Brexit and secure a referendum.
